price: Should We then turn the Reminder[3] away from you simply because you are a transgressing people?
arabic: أَفَنَضۡرِبُ عَنكُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَ صَفۡحًا أَن كُنتُمۡ قَوۡمٗا مُّسۡرِفِينَ
